\makeatletter
\newcommand{\DefineMetric}[2]{\expandafter\def\csname metric@#1\endcsname{#2}}
\newcommand{\Metric}[1]{%
  \ifcsname metric@#1\endcsname
    \csname metric@#1\endcsname
  \else
    \textbf{??}%
  \fi}
\newcommand{\MetricOr}[2]{%
  \ifcsname metric@#1\endcsname
    \csname metric@#1\endcsname
  \else
    #2%
  \fi}
\newcommand{\IfMetricTF}[3]{%
  \ifcsname metric@#1\endcsname
    #2%
  \else
    #3%
  \fi}
\makeatother
